body:
1. You should not set the wall with a window to adiabatic. It will crash EnergyPlus. I think Honeybee does remove adiabatic from surfaces with windows automatically.

2. It won't effect the solr gains. Check EnergyPlus Adiabatic Walls definition here: [http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-2/engineering-reference/adi...](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-2/engineering-reference/adiabatic-boundary-conditions.html)
